GameConditionDef.label: qi burst
GameConditionDef.description: A burst of Qi is permeating the area, increasing any cultivators Qi Recovery by 7x and occasionaly converting trees into spirit trees.(WIP, currently using placeholder GameCondition_PsychicEmanation)
GameConditionDef.letterText: A burst of Qi is now permeating the area, increasing any cultivators Qi Recovery by 7x and occasionaly converting trees into spirit trees.(WIP, currently using placeholder GameCondition_PsychicEmanation)
